Synopsis:

The House of Batiatus is on the rise, being leveraged by the brilliance of his champion gladiator Gannicus (Dustin Clare), whose skill with a sword is matched only by his thirst for wine and women. These have been the times by which the young Batiatus has been waiting to dethrone his father's power and thus take control of Capua. Batiatus has next to his loyal and calculating wife Lucretia, and her seductive friend Gaia. Together, they will seek to deceive the masses, seize power, and control Capua, the audacious prequel to "Spartacus: Blood and Sand."
